entry.title: BLACK RETRO REV POLO T-SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-shirt
Price: 5200.00

DESCRIPTION

THE BLACK RETRO REV POLO T-SHIRT IS YOUR ENTRY INTO THE BLUORNG RACING CLUB EXPERIENCE!

THIS ZIPPER POLO FEATURES A HD SCREEN PRINT ON THE FRONT AND THE BACK AND HAS BEEN CREATED WITH CUT AND SEW PANELS. THE POLO'S DESIGN IS A MIXTURE OF BLUORNG'S SIGNATURE DESIGN LANGUAGE AND THE WORLD OF RACING. 

DETAILS

100% cotton

Weight - 260GSM

High density Screen Print

Cut and Sew Panel

Machine Reverse wash

Dispatch next day.

entry.title: BLACK EMERALD FLAMINGO POLO T-SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-shirt
Price: 5200.00

Description

Step up your streetwear game with the Black Emerald Flamingo Polo T-Shirt – bold, elevated, and built to stand out.
Crafted from premium 100% cotton pique and weighing in at a sturdy 300 GSM, this polo brings a luxurious touch to everyday comfort. The oversized fit gives it a relaxed, confident vibe, while the embroidered flamingo logo adds a pop of personality and street-style flair.

Whether you're heading out or dressing it down, this high-quality polo delivers effortless style with a clean finish.
From casual Fridays to weekend scenes, this statement piece is your go-to for elevated ease.

Details

100% Cotton PIQUE

Weight - 300GSM

Screen Puff Print

Machine Reverse wash

Description

Own your style with the White Emerald Flamingo Polo T-Shirt – bold, breezy, and built for standout moments.
Crafted from premium 100% cotton pique, this 300 GSM polo blends streetwear edge with a touch of everyday luxury. The crisp white base is elevated by the vibrant emerald flamingo embroidery, adding a unique pop that sets this piece apart.

With its relaxed, oversized fit and breathable texture, this high-quality polo is designed to move with you – from casual hangouts to styled-up weekends. Classic, cool, and made for those who lead with confidence.

Whether you're keeping it chill or stepping out loud, the White Emerald Flamingo Polo brings effortless streetwear flair to your rotation.
